DOC.brief_title: Cellulose Sulfate HIV Transmission Among Women
DOC.detailed_description: Despite availability effective HIV prevention method , i.e . condom , epidemic continue grow . There thus urgent need additional HIV prevention method . One possibility use microbicides , i.e . chemical product may use vagina rectum potential prevent HIV infection . Cellulose sulfate HIV entry inhibitor vitro effect N. gonorrhoeae ( NG ) C. trachomatis ( CT ) sexually transmit organism . The study assess effect vaginal transmission HIV , NG CT among woman high risk heterosexual STI infection ( define two partner last three month average three sexual act per week ) . The study randomize , triple-blinded , placebo control .
DOC.criteria: least 18 year old average least three vaginal sex act per week , least three different partner last three month , expect continue behavior HIV negative willing able comply protocol pregnancy allergy latex spermicides intravenous drug user
